Bicycles

The Bicycles node holds the project preferences in addition to the list of bicycles.

BicycleLayout

This controls how the bicycles are laid out. Options are for the front wheel, bottom bracket, and rear wheel. The options are for center points or points projected to the ground.

BackgroundColor

The color of the screen background.

ShowRiderPoints

Toggles the display of the rider control points on or off. The rioder control points are the 'attachment points' of the rider to the bicycle.

ControlPointColor

The color of the rider control points.

ShowAnalysis

Toggles the display of the analysis center lines on or off.

AnalysisColor

The color of the analysis center lines.

ShowGround

Toggles the display of the ground reference line on or off.

GroundColor

The color of the ground line.
